name: Cook'n'Slash!
description:
Controls:
  • WASD to move.
  • MOUSE to aim.
  • LMB (hold or click) to attack.
  • Numbers to choose a weapon. 1 always selects fork. The fork is not a weapon and does not hurt enemies! It is used only to carry ingredients into the pan!
  • HOLD DOWN the LMB to carry the objects with a fork.
  • ESC to pause or open menu.
Gameplay:

1) Chop enemies into pieces. If you manage to kill all the enemies, it brings you 1 Michelin star!

2) Every killed enemy adds you some extra time.

3) Grab enemy remainings with a fork and carry them into the pan.

4) Follow the recipe carefully. Every 10 seconds the contents of the pan is fried and the dish (right or not!) is prepared.

5) Every correct dish adds extra 5 seconds to the timer.

6) To get 2 Michelin stars you must kill every enemy on the level and prepare 1 right dish according to the recipe.

7) To get 3 Michelin stars you must kill every enemy and prepare 3 correct dishes and no wrong ones.

8) Watch the time: when the timer expires, the level is over, regardless of whether you managed to kill everyone or cook a meal.

Good luck!
